item.title: CVE-2019-19788|2024-08-05T02:25:12.685Z -- opera%20software%20as -- opera%20for%20android
item.description: Opera for Android before 54.0.2669.49432 is vulnerable to a sandboxed cross-origin iframe bypass attack. By using a service working inside a sandboxed iframe it is possible to bypass the normal sandboxing attributes. This allows an attacker to make forced redirections without any user interaction from a third-party context.
